name: Mid Century Italian Armchair in Cut Mohair

condition.details: Reupholstered. Wear consistent with age and use. Minor fading. Good vintage condition. Signs of wear as expected with age and use. Newly reupholstered. Wood frames show patina and mild blemishes throughout.

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: A mid century Italian armchair. Wood frame with new upholstery in a geometric cut velvet mohair. Sourced in Northern Italy. Two available, sold separately.
